lead_paragraph: Photographs of C. C. Sabathia’s father adorn a cabinet door on his son’s locker, mementos of the man who accidentally bought C. C. a baseball glove for the wrong hand, turning him into a left-hander.
snippet: Photographs of C. C. Sabathia’s father adorn a cabinet door on his son’s locker, mementos of the man who accidentally bought C. C. a baseball glove for the wrong hand, turning him into a left-hander.
